titles.title: Realistic Roofing Tax Treatment Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the depreciation recovery period for roof systems.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
1/4/2007--Introduced.
Realistic Roofing Tax Treatment Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to classify any roof system as 20-year property for depreciation purposes.
